alert.note: Alert for Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sutton County through 945 PM CDT... At 859 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Intersection Of I-10 And Ranch Road 1989, or 10 miles northwest of Sonora, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of I-10 And Ranch Road 1989. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 385 and 394. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
